meanings.definition: A person who installs, operates, maintains, or repairs electrical wiring and equipment.
meanings.sent1: The electrician fixed the broken wires in the house.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor hired an electrician to install new lights in their garage.
meanings.sent3: Why did the electrician bring a light bulb to the party? To brighten up the mood!
meanings.sent4: The electrician's expertise in handling electrical issues was like a beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The electrician's toolbox was filled with all the tools needed to tackle any electrical problem.

meanings.definition: A skilled tradesperson specializing in electrical work.
meanings.sent1: The electrician carefully wired the new circuit in the building.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a talented electrician who can fix any electrical problem.
meanings.sent3: Why did the electrician wear sunglasses to work? Because of all the bright ideas!
meanings.sent4: The electrician's precision in his work was like that of a surgeon in an operating room.
meanings.sent5: The electrician's hands moved swiftly and surely as he worked on the electrical panel.
